name: NETXP LINUX Suspicious activity related to Systemd
description: Monitors various systemd-related events, including executions of /bin/systemctl, and changes to systemd configuration directories (/etc/systemd/, /usr/lib/systemd, etc.). systemd is a system and service manager for Linux.
author: Szymon Gluch
query:
//any where auditd.log.key: "systemd" and 
any where event.module: "auditd"
